text: Thomas Fisher Railsback (January 22, 1932 â€“ January 20, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He served eight terms in the United States Congress from 1967 to 1983 for in Moline. He was known for being one of the few Republicans to support the impeachment of Richard Nixon. Railsback died on January 20, 2020, in Mesa, Arizona from a long-illness at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biographical Directory of the United States Congress * Political Graveyard Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians [[Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly]
title: Tom Railsback
